name: Hyperdrivepanda.GitHub.io
body:
### Software Page
A budding programmer looking to find some work in computing. Near the end of my course at centennial college, I've Practiced: Visual C#, HTML web design, SQL Database design/maintenance, Office Programs such as Excel and Powerpoint. Once I finish the last semester of my 2 year course I will be a certified software engineer. 

### Ready to work
If there's a website you have in mind, maybe a logo you want made, or an application you want someone to create, send me a message and we'll discuss it.

###Contact
Roy_g_biv@hotmail.co.uk

github.com/hyperdrivePanda
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
